lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Sunday about Penn State’s college football victory over Michigan State, which clinched a spot in the Rose Bowl, misstated the number of times Penn State has appeared in that game. It is two, not one. (In addition to the Rose Bowl of January 1995, Penn State also played in the January 1923 game.).
